message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I understand its true worth to be $15000. However, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $12000. This represents a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.
